affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
notes:
Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.
Interrupts channeling spells.
attrib:
DURATION: 1/2/2/3
RADIUS: 400
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 80/60/120/100
TOTAL DAMAGE: 80/120/240/300
UNIT COUNT: 2
cmb:
110
14/12/10/8
lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
name: ember_spirit_searing_chains

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
notes:
Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds.
Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.
attrib:
RADIUS: 250/350/450/550
BONUS HERO DAMAGE: 20/40/60/80
ATTACK INTERVAL: 0.2
CREEP DAMAGE PENALTY: 50%
cmb:
50
30/22/14/6
lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
name: ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
attrib:
DURATION: 8/12/16/20
RADIUS: 400
MAGIC ABSORB: 50/200/350/500
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 30/40/50/60
cmb:
80/90/100/110
35
lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
name: ember_spirit_flame_guard

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
cmb:
150
0
lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!
name: ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
notes:
Starts with 3 charges (maximum).
Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.
attrib:
MAX CHARGES: 3
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 35
DAMAGE: 100/150/200
RADIUS: 450
DURATION: 45
cmb: 0
lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
name: ember_spirit_fire_remnant
